tool.name: HAPmaker
tool.description: A tool to generate hap-mer tables from FastK k-mer data of maternal, paternal, and child sequences
tool.command: ln -s $maternal maternal.ktab && ln -s $paternal paternal.ktab && ln -s $child child.ktab && ln -s $ktab_files ktab_files.zip && unzip ktab_files && HAPmaker -v -T\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} maternal.ktab paternal.ktab child.ktab && zip intermediate_ktab_files _HMAKE* ._HMAKE*

param.name: ktab_files
param.label: Select the ZIP file consisting of all intermediate Ktab file

tool.help: HAPmaker generates hap-mer tables for parental datasets for merquryfk pipeline. Before running HAPplot or MerquryFK in trio mode, it is necessary to generate a table of hap-mers for both the mother and father, using FastK k-mer tables from the maternal, paternal, and child sequence data sets. The output of this process produces two k-mer tables: <mat>.hap.ktab for the maternal hap-mers and <pat>.hap.ktab for the paternal hap-mers.
